Html:
(Originally posted at http://forums.asp.net/thread/1609954.aspx)

The additions look great! I want to convert my existing Club Starter Kit 1.0 to 2.0 but I have done some changes to the colors and images (see www.cwysc.org) but I can't figure out where to make the cosmetic changes in v2. I am a WinForms programmer (not ASP) so you may need to talk slowly :)

Thanks

Dan

Upgrading from 1.0 is going to be a pain... I would create a new theme inside 2.0.

1) Download and install 2.0 RC
2) Copy App_Themes/ClubSite and paste
3) Rename it to what you want.
4) Copy in your images
5) Copy in your stylesheet
6) Change your web.config from <pages theme=" .... to <pages theme="Your Theme (I'm not sure what line.)
